entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
